Posts.Content: hope10 wrote: Hi everyone, I  had a right side masectomy dec 2 and shortly afterwards had 5 weeks of radiation which finished march 3. I had a pet scan  end of April. It shows possible upper right lobe mass. the follow up  xray shows chest cavity lesion. One Doctors thinks it is scar tissue damage from radiation, and thinks it was too soon after rad to have a scan. one thinks it may be a mass and wants be to have a lung biospy. Occ. i do have shortness of breath and a pain in my right lung when i take a deep breath. anybody with similiar problems? thanks for being out there. Dx 1/12/2009, IDC, Stage IV, mets, ER+, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: hope10 wrote: Hi everyone, I am going on week 2 of afinitor and aromasin. The first week left me nauseated and exhausted. I still work four days a week. I was so tired,  barely able to make it through the week. It took me my surprise. I guess I was not expecting this. The only side effects  my doctor warned  me about were the mouth sores. I was on fasodex injection monthly before and felt pretty good. The problems was that right side pleural effusion was getting worst, ended up getting thoracentesis.   Did anybody else feel this way? If so does it get better or worst? Also, when did women start getting cold sores?  I guess any chemo will make you feel crappy.  I am debating if I should go out on FLA or STD.  Thank you for in advance for you input.    Dx 1/12/2009, IDC, Stage IV, mets, ER+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Starting Afinitor and Aromasin, what to expect? hope10 Rseman

Posts.Content: Oct 31, 2011 09:25PM - edited Oct 31, 2011 09:31PM by hope10 Hi, I have to have a thorcencentis for pleural effusion  and then begin. My Doctor wants me to try Halaven, but i am do not want to loose my hair again do not like the side effect that i read about. Did anyone loose their hair with gemcitabine? I am so thankful that i have this site to turn too.  thanks    Hope

Posts.Content: Sep 29, 2012 02:44PM hope10 wrote: Hi Pearlady, I take Afinitor 10 mg. and Aromasin 20 mg. daily. Also Xgeva monthy injections for bone mets. I think i have opposite problem of you big D (diarrhea)? I feel constipated and poor appetite. I did gain about  about 10lbs on fasodex, but just lost because i  am no long hungry on Afinitor. I heard a lot of great good things about Afinitor.i hope it works for me and all of us!!!! thanks,Hope
Posts.Title: Starting Afinitor and Aromasin, what to expect? hope10 Rseman

Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2012 08:24PM hope10 wrote: Pearlady, I am going on week three, and the side effects are getting better. Less tired amd not as nauseated. Also, notice my cough is getting better. Before i started  I was coughing more and nervous my lung pleural effusion was getting worst. I am actually feeling better being back on chemo. You are an inspiration of 11 years with metz.  It gives me hope to fight this awful disease. Positive energy continues !!! Hope

Posts.Content: hope10 wrote: Two months post radiation I developed a dry, persisitent cough. I also noticed that when i would run up stairs i would get short of breath. Unfortunaetly, my Doctor thinks that I  have radiation pnemonitis. He told me that only 2% people get this side effect.  I have started on  a large dose of  predisone and have to be on for 9 weeks  which  is making gain weight. The only good thing is it is giving me energy. Has anybody else had this ? What was your course of treatment? thanks for being out there. Hope Dx 1/12/2009, IDC, Stage IV, mets, ER+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
